description: The SOCIAL_HX_ALC_USE  table contains social alcohol history data entered in clinical system patient encounters. Note: Typically, only the most recent social history data for a patient is extracted. However, you may elect to extract all social history contacts if you wish. In this case, since one patient encounter may contain multiple social history contacts, each contact is uniquely identified by a combination of the patient encounter serial number and a line number.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The contact date on which the history information was collected.

columns.name: ALCOHOL_DRINKS_WK
columns.description: Stores the alcohol history of drinks per week.

columns.name: HX_DRINK_TYPES_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the type of alcohol consumed for alcohol history.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Glasses of wine


Cans of beer


Shots of liquor


Drinks containing 0.5 oz of alcohol


Standard drinks or equivalent
